Hi there, my name is Roma and I'm from Kremenchuk, Ukraine. I enjoy playing board games, with Dead of Winter and Terraforming Mars being two of my favorites. The idea for this app came to me while playing Stars Realms (which has terrible tokens). I decided to develop this mobile app in my free time.

Every new review, email, or donation makes me happy. If you have something to share, have found any messy translations, or just want to let me know what you're counting, feel free to reach out.

I lost my job due to the war in my country, but I have decided to keep this app free without advertisements and with all its features available. If you would like to support an indie developer (me), please consider making a small donation within the app.

Thank you!

🇷🇴 Andrei Iacob

Calling all language wizards and animal enthusiasts! Let\'s spice up our beloved app with translations and hilarious animal aliases.\n\nJoin the party and be as cool as people who already lent their awesomeness:
Tap on the "+" button in the top right corner to add a new counter
You can edit these values in the settings

Hi, my name is Roma and I\'m from Kremenchuk, Ukraine. Unfortunately, I lost my job due to the war in my country. However, I made the decision to keep my app free of ads and with full functionality.\n\nIf you\'d like to support an independent solo developer like me, please consider making a donation, either once or multiple times, within the app. Thank you!
Tap anywhere or shake your device to roll the dice
